threeday.summary:
In Somerset, severe river flooding on the Somerset Levels will continue for at least the next three days where there is a HIGH overall flood risk.
River levels are now gradually falling on the River Thames, however, there are still significant flooding impacts along large stretches of the Thames where the overall flood risk is MEDIUM.
There is a LOW overall flood risk from coastal flooding over the next three days along parts of the north coast of Devon and Cornwall. This also applies around Chiswell and Preston Beach in Dorset, where beach defences have been degraded by recent storms.
On the River Severn in Worcestershire and Gloucestershire, river levels are gradually receding with minor impacts continuing for the next three days. Likewise in Kent, minor impacts are continuing on the River Stour for at least the next three days, giving a LOW flood risk overall. Impacts include flooding of some properties and agricultural land as well as travel disruption.
There is an ongoing risk from groundwater flooding in Hampshire, Wiltshire, Dorset, Brighton and Hove, Kent and Greater London (Croydon area) for the next three days. Significant impacts are expected such as flooding to properties and roads, and travel disruption. There is a MEDIUM overall flood risk in these areas. There is also a risk of minor groundwater flooding for much of south-east and south-central England through the next three days, bringing a LOW overall flood risk.
This forecast is updated at least once daily - please check again for the latest forecast. For local flood information please contact Floodline on 0345 9881188 or 0845 9881188.
threeday.summary_cymru:
Yng Ngwlad yr Haf, mi fydd y llifogydd afon difrifol ar Wastadeddau Gwlad yr Haf yn parhau am o leiaf y tri diwrnod nesaf, lle mae risg UCHEL o lifogydd yn gyffredinol.
Mae lefel yr afon yn disgyn yn raddol ar yr Afon Tafwys, peth bynnag, mae effeithiau llifogydd sylweddol ar hyd rhannau helaeth o'r Afon Tafwys lle mae risg CANOLIG o lifogydd yn gyffredinol.
Mae risg ISEL o lifogydd arfordirol yn gyffredinol dros y tri diwrnod nesaf ar hyd rhannau o arfordir gogleddol Dyfnaint a Chernyw. Mae hyn hefyd yn berthnasol o amgylch Chiswell a Thraeth Preston yn Dorset, lle mae amddiffynfeydd traeth wedi cael eu diraddio gan stormydd diweddar.
Ar yr Afon Hafren yn Swydd Gaerwrangon a Swydd Gaerloyw, mae lefel yr afon yn cilio yn raddol gyda ychydig o effeithiau parhaus ar gyfer y tri diwrnod nesaf. Yn yr un modd yng Nghaint, mae ychydig o effeithiau yn parhau ar yr Afon Stour am o leiaf y tri diwrnod nesaf, gan roi risg ISEL o lifogydd yn gyffredinol. Mi fydd effeithiau yn cynnwys llifogydd i thai a tir amaethyddol yn ogystal â chreu anhawster wrth deithio.
Mae risg parhaus o lifogydd dwr daear yn Hampshire , Wiltshire, Dorset, Brighton, Hove, Caint a Llundain Fwyaf (ardal Croydon) am y tri diwrnod nesaf. Disgwylir effeithiau sylweddol fel llifogydd i thai a ffyrdd, a hynny'n creu anhawster wrth deithio. Mae risg CANOLIG o lifogydd yn gyffredinol yn yr ardaloedd yma. Mae yna hefyd risg o ychydig o lifogydd dwr daear ar gyfer llawer o dde-ddwyrain a de-ganolig Lloegr trwy'r tri diwrnod nesaf, gan ddod â risg ISEL o lifogydd yn gyffredinol.
Mae'r rhagolwg hwn yn cael ei diweddaru o leiaf unwaith y dydd - edrychwch eto ar gyfer y rhagolygon diweddaraf.
Ar gyfer gwybodaeth llifogydd lleol, cysylltwch â Floodline ar 0345 9881188 neu 0845 9881188.

risk.impact: Severe disruption. Widespread flooding of property. Severe disruption to travel. Loss of gas, electricity, water supplies. Significant disruption to communities. Evacuation expected.
risk.advice: Significant risk to life. Take action to protect yourself and follow the advice of the emergency services.

risk.impact: Significant disruption. Flooding of homes, businesses and transport links - disruption to travel. Disruption to gas, electricity, water supplies and telecoms. Evacuation may be required.
risk.advice: Flooding of property is expected. Take action to protect yourself and your property.

risk.impact: Minor disruption. Flooding of fields, recreational land and car parks. Flooding of a small number of homes and businesses. Wet road services and possibility of ponding water. Local disruption to travel - longer journey times.
risk.advice: Flooding of property is possible - be prepared. Stay vigilant. Water on roads - take care when driving.

risk.impact: Minimal disruption. Flooding of fields, recreational land and car parks. Some local disruption to travel. Wet road services and possibility of ponding water.
risk.advice: Flooding is possible - be prepared. Stay vigilant. Water on roads - take care when driving.
